Quality Education.reason: The course is fundamentally about higher education, aiming to transform students from 'consumers' to 'producers' of historical knowledge by teaching research methods, theories, and writing strategies.
evidence: 本課程以介紹大學部學生史學研究的觀念、理論、方法和書寫策略上等相關課題為主 (This course focuses on introducing undergraduate students to the concepts, theories, methods, and writing strategies of historical research)
希望研習學生從歷史知識的「消費者」角色，逐漸成為「鑑賞者」和「生產者」的角色 (hoping students will gradually transform from 'consumers' of historical knowledge to 'appreciators' and 'producers')

通過本課程的訓練，有志於繼續深造的同學可以對正規學術研究的基本風貌有初步的了解 (Through the training of this course, students who aspire to further their studies can have a preliminary understanding of the basic features of formal academic research)
